about_the_game:
Lemon: the Ultimate Clicker Game

Welcome to the world of Lemon, the clicker game that will have you wondering how Lemons became the most addictive thing since cat videos. In Lemon, your mission is to click your way to Lemon glory. As you tap, click, and furiously smash that mouse button, you'll gather Lemons faster than you can say "Lemon counter."

But wait, there's more! Lemon isn’t just about mindless clicking (okay, it mostly is, but bear with us). After a specific amount of time, your patience will be rewarded with mysterious inventory drops. What’s inside, you ask? Could it be a golden Lemon? A magic Lemon? A basket of Lemons? Who knows! The only way to find out is to keep clicking and praying to the Lemon gods.

Featuring:

Addictive Clicker Gameplay: Once you start, you won't be able to stop. Seriously, we've tried.

Mysterious Inventory Drops: Because who doesn’t love a good surprise? Especially when it involves Lemons.

So, put on your Lemon boots, grab your clicking finger, and dive into the wonderfully weird world of Lemon. May the Lemons be ever in your favor!

name: Lemon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 265 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to Lemon, the clicker game more addictive than cat videos! Click your way to Lemon glory, gathering Lemons faster than you can say "Lemon counter." Unlock mysterious inventory drops with golden Lemons, magic Lemons. Dive in and may the Lemons be ever in your favor!
